author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Witness a fun-filled fashion extravaganza at NZ Fashion WeekendTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Witness a fun-filled fashion extravaganza at NZ Fashion Weekend Published on : Sunday, July 5, 2015
NZ Fashion Weekend delivers a fun-filled fashion extravaganza with designer in-season catwalk shows from some of New Zealand’s fashion icons, including Trelise Cooper, Kate Sylvester and Moochi.
Go beyond the runway and gain expert tips and tricks from the industry’s best beauty brands, M.A.C and Smashbox, with their in-depth beauty sessions.
Get pampered at the beauty hub, soak up the atmosphere and entertainment, then discover designers in the exhibition hall.
You can also shop till you drop in the all-new Designer Pop-Up Sale with incredible brands at bargain prices.
The event will be held on August 28-30.
